product_desc: Premium Natural Chia Seeds - Weight Loss With Omega 3, Non-GMO
about_the_product:
About the Product:
Farmley Premium Chia Seeds are loaded with health benefits and nutrients. It is 100% natural, free from any chemicals or preservatives and best selected. They are slightly subtle and nutty-flavoured seeds. It is high in fibre and protein and filled with lots of health benefits. It can be eaten raw, soaked in juice, added to porridge, pudding, smoothies or added to baked goods. They can also sprinkle them on top of cereal, yogurt, vegetables, or rice dishes.
Ingredients:
Chia Seeds.
Nutritional Facts:

Carbohydrates 44.0 g
Protein 16.5 g 
Total Sugar Nil g 
Total fat 31.0 g 
Saturated fat 4.2 g 
Trans fat Nil g 
Dietary Fiber 33.4 g

How to Use:
First, soak Raw Chia Seeds in water for 2-3 minutes.
Then use them the way you want (as a porridge, yogurt, salad etc.).
They can also be added to your bakery goods

product_USP: Naturally Nutritious Snack, Source of Potassium, Source of Fibre, Zero Trans Fat
about_the_product:
About the Product:
Figs are sweet fruit with multiple seeds and soft skin, which can be eaten ripe or dried. Figs are also called one of nature’s candies because they are high in natural sugar. Figs are rich in fibre, and magnesium and are a great source of various other vitamins and minerals. ProV Premium Dried Figs (Anjeer) provides you with this sweet fruit in its ready-to-eat dried form, which is a naturally sweet snack available for you all year round.
We at ‘ProV’ believe in creating a line of ‘Nature's Nutritious Produce’ to provide you with an alternative to those relatively unhealthy options that surround us in our fast-paced life. Explore, to know more.
 Benefits 

Premium quality Anjeer.
Great source of potassium and fibre.
Zero trans-fat.
Good for snacking.
Sourced from the finest orchards.
Inspires healthier choices for nutritional living.
A step towards wholesome goodness.
Ingredients:
Dried Figs.
How to Use:
Now make your snacking time more healthy and nutritional with ProV premium anjeer.
You can also make several desserts with the same as it provides a great texture and taste.
A perfect accompaniment during a travelling to satisfy your hunger pangs.
Storage Instructions: Best to be stored at room temperature, away from moisture.

As Per 100 g

Energy 325kcal
Total Fat 0.9g
Carbohydrate 74.3g

Sodium 16.6mg

About the Product:
Aashirvaad ensures that only superior quality ingredients reach your kitchen, and Aashirvaad Coriander Powder stays true to that word. Aashirvaad Coriander Powder has been made with love in India using a 4-step advantage process to ensure that only a high-quality product reaches your kitchen.
Aashirvaad has a wide network of farmers covering. It sources dry coriander seeds for its powder directly from these farmers. The experts then carefully select dry, healthy, and round coriander seeds. This ensures that Aashirvaad Coriander Powder is perfectly balanced in aroma and flavour. The automated packaging and processing with zero human intervention ensure purity in every pack.
With no added flavours and colours, Aashirvaad Coriander Powder is so potent that even a tiny quantity enhances the aroma and flavour of the dish. So, add a pinch of this coriander powder to bring alive the authentic taste of your preparation!
Ingredients:
Whole Coriander
Features:
1.Aashirvaad Coriander Powder is made using a 4-step advantage process to ensure high-quality coriander powder
2.Coriander seeds are sourced directly from the farmers
3.Dry, healthy, full, and round coriander seeds are selected by experts to ensure that Aashirvaad Coriander Powder is perfectly balanced in aroma and flavour
4.The automated packaging and processing ensure that coriander powder remains safe
5.Made from locally grown ingredients, Aashirvaad Coriander Powder is made with love in India
How to Use:
It can be used as a non-vegetarian dish or even a simple sambar or rasam.

About the Product:
Double Horse Nano Soya Chunks are made from soy flour. Soya Chunks contain immunity building nutrients, protein, iron and zinc. It is rich in dietary fibre and strengthens your immunity. It is very easy to prepare and makes tasty dishes. They are a blank canvas that you can paint on, they are odourless and tasteless by themselves. It can be used in many dishes and it is healthy and a good source of calcium. It is also a great replacement for chicken or any other meat.
Nutritional Facts:
Per 100 g :-

Energy/Calories 332 Cal/139 KJ,
Total Fat 0 g,
Saturated fat 0 g,
Trans Fat 0 g,
Cholesterol 0 mg,
Sodium 0 mg,
Total Carbohydrate 29 mg,
Dietary fibre 4 g,
Total Sugars 0 g,
Protein 54 g,
Calcium 614 mg,
Iron 4 mg.
Ingredients:
100 % Soya (defatted).
Storage and Uses:
Soak these soya chunks for around 10 minutes before use.
To soak, place in a small dish and add seasonings such as garam masala, soy sauce or balsamic vinegar, before covering with boiling water.
The soya chunks will expand and will then be ready to cook as if they were normal meat.
Store in a clean, cool and dry place.
Keep away from direct sunlight.

About the Product:
Graminway Rajgira Ka Atta is obtained from Rajgira/Ramadana (amaranth seeds). It is an ideal source of proteins for vegetarians and is mostly consumed during a fast. This flour in gluten-free. This flour is used for making desserts like halwa, ladoo and also used for making dosa, cheela, poori, and chapatti. At Graminway, they believe that everyone deserves to live a full and healthy life. The intake of their food supplements will provide a good foundation for a healthy lifestyle. They are committed to providing the highest quality products at affordable price. They are a company with a purpose beyond profit and want to make a lasting difference in the world. Graminway aims to provide clean, natural, and healthy products without compromising on the flavours and taste. They produce them in small batches, which helps maintain freshness and preserve the ingredient texture. By not stockpiling, each product is as fresh as possible when it reaches your doorstep.
How to Use:
It is used for roti, cheela and dosa as a healthy alternative to wheat flour.

About the Product:
The Pro Nature Brown Sugar brings to you an organic and wholesome natural sweetener that is a must-have in any Indian pantry. One of the best substitutes for white sugar, natural brown sugar is packed with nutrients. The most notable nutritional difference between the two is that brown sugar has slightly higher calcium, iron, and potassium content and the added flavour can be used in different ways in baking and cooking. For example, brown sugar is used for dense baked goods, such as breads and rich cookies. Explore Pro Nature's wide range of products including Millets, Flours, Spices, Breakfast products and more, on Big Basket.

Brown Sugar

About the Product:
Wheat - Sihor is a unique variety of wheat grain predominantly grown in the Sihor region of Gujarat, India. This type of wheat is widely appreciated for its superior quality and exceptional taste. Sihor wheat is renowned for its high milling characteristics and is often used in the production of various types of bread, noodles, pasta, and other bakery items. The grains are medium to large in size with a hard texture, making them ideal for grinding into flour. Sihor wheat is also used in the preparation of traditional Indian dishes like chapatis, puris, and parathas due to its excellent dough-making properties. The cultivation of Sihor wheat also plays a significant role in the local economy, offering a sustainable livelihood to many farmers in the region. The grain's popularity extends beyond Gujarat, reaching different parts of the country and even gaining recognition internationally.

About the Product:
For most Indians, comfort food is always linked to easy-to-cook homemade meals, and what can be more convenient and quicker than preparing a hearty dal meal? Essential in every household, Tata Sampann dals are unpolished and do not undergo any artificial polishing with water, oil, or leather, thereby retaining their goodness and wholesome character. The 5-step process ensures that Tata Sampann grains are uniform and of premium quality, giving you an all-natural authentic taste. A staple in the Indian diet, Masoor Dal provides nutrients such as protein and fibre. Made of select grains and recommended by Chef Sanjeev Kapoor and Chef Ranveer Brar, Tata Sampann Unpolished Masoor Dal makes for a delicious meal choice. So, whenever you are in the mood to cook something easy and delicious, dive into the scrumptious taste of Tata Sampann pulses and enjoy a lovely meal! Explore Tata Sampann Pulses range - Toor dal, Chana dal, Moong dal, Moong dal Chilka, Green Moong, Masoor Small dal, Kabuli Chana, Masoor Whole dal, Kali Masoor dal, Urad dal, Urad Whole dal, Urad Kali, Kala Chana, and Rajma.
How to Use:
Amazing Recipes: Used in delicious khichdi and eaten in the form of curries or combined with vegetables.
Storage:
Store in a cool and dry place. Transfer contents to an airtight container after opening.

Tata Sampann Masoor Dal (Split) is delicious in tasteNo artificial polishing with water, oil, or leather, thereby retaining their goodness and wholesome character5-step process for stringent quality checksRecommended by Chef Sanjeev Kapoor and Chef Ranveer BrarUsed in a variety of salads, khichdi, soups, and many more.

product_desc: Virgin Coconut Oil - Cold Pressed, Natural
product_USP: Preservative Free, Zero Trans Fat, Zero Cholesterol
about_the_product:
About the Product:
Coco Soul Cold Pressed Virgin Coconut Oil (VCNO) Superfood is 100% pure and natural.
It is specifically prepared from fresh raw coconuts through a meticulous No Heat Process; a cold extraction technology which helps preserve the vital nutrients, rich aroma and flavour of real coconuts, making it fit for raw consumption.
VCNO Superfood is one of the richest plant-based sources of naturally occurring Medium Chain Triglycerides (MCTs).
These MCTs contribute to 60% of the total fatty acid content and unlike long-chain saturated fats, get rapidly digested for instant energy release.
Its high content of naturally occurring Lauric acid (C12) and Vitamin E allows for an incredible array of health-promoting properties.
It can also help in weight management. The MCTs in VCNOÂ break down into ketones that can support cognition and memory function.
Due to its better oxidative stability, VCNO is a great cooking medium even at high temperatures.
Ingredients:
Virgin Cococnut oil
How to Use:
Serving Size : 4-5 Teaspoons a day for Direct consumption|It can be used for cooking, marinating, frying, baking and sauces.
It enhances the taste in smoothies, shakes and is a salad dressing.
Nutritional Facts:
(per 100 g)

Energy 900 Kcal
Protein- 0g
Carbohydrates- 0 g
Sugar - 0 g
Fat - 100 g
Saturated Fat - 94.16 g
Mono unsaturated fat- 5 g
Poly unsaturated fat- 0.84 36 g
Trans fat - 0 g
Cholesterol - 0 mg.

About the Product:
Turmeric Powder is one of the key ingredients in cooking. The turmeric (haldi) is finely ground and blends in your recipes to give your dishes flavour & a warm golden yellow hue. Turmeric powder has several medical benefits as per Ayurveda - some of them are: a natural healing agent for cuts and bruises. Alongside, it helps in quick recovery from cough, cold and sore throat.

About the Product:
These tiny black cumin seeds go by various regional names, but pack a solid punch in terms of flavour - imagine a nutty, slightly bitter taste with undertones of onion and pepper. Nigella or kalonji form one of the five spices in East Indian and Bangladeshi panch phoron, a spice mix made with five seeds and used to flavour lentil stews and vegetable stir-fries. You might also recognise it as the black seeds traditionally flecking soft, buttery naan bread! Other cultures use nigella in baking, for the crunch and the onion-like flavour. Try sprinkling some on bread, bagels and croissants for a new flavour dimension, or add it to salad dressings for texture. JK Masala's especially packed nigella seeds will be a lovely, flavourful addition to your spice rack!
Ingredients:
Nigella Seed

product_USP: Perfectly Blended Spices For Rich Taste & Aroma
about_the_product:
About the Product:
Experience the vibrant street food culture of Mumbai with our Bhaji Pav Masala. Carefully crafted, this spice blend captures the essence of Mumbai's iconic Bhaji Pav, combining premium spices like coriander, cumin, and amchoor. Elevate your culinary journey with the authentic flavours of Mumbai street food, creating a symphony of taste and aroma in every bite. Whether used in mixed vegetable bhaji or other dishes, Bhaji Pav Masala ensures a delightful gastronomic experience reminiscent of the bustling streets of Mumbai.
Ingredients:
Fennel, Red Chilli, Coriander, Cumin, Stone Flower (Lichen), White Pepper, Tejpat, Cassia, Ajwain, lodised Salt, Clove, Turmeric, Kachari, Mace, Cardamom and Black Salt.
Benefits:
Authentic Mumbai Street Food Flavours: Bhaji Pav Masala brings the authentic taste of Mumbai's street food to your home, with a perfectly balanced blend of spices like coriander, cumin, and amchoor, ensuring the distinctive flavours of this iconic dish.


Versatile Spice Mix: This masala is versatile and can be used to enhance various dishes beyond Bhaji Pav, making it a kitchen essential for infusing a burst of Mumbai-style flavour into your favourite recipes.


Time-Saving Convenience: Bhaji Pav Masala offers the convenience of a pre-mixed spice blend, allowing you to effortlessly recreate the vibrant and aromatic flavours of Mumbai street food without the need to individually measure and blend spices.
How to Use:
Ready to mix.

About the Product:
Red rice is known for its medicinal purposes and can be used for making culinary delights.
It is unhulled or partially hulled rice with a red husk.
It is a great source of fiber and can help remove toxins from the body.
It is good for heart health as it soaks up cholesterol and feeds the fine bacteria in the intestines.
Red rice has proanthocyanidins, plant pigments which inform to foods a ruddy, purplish colour.
Nutritional Facts:
Calories: 168,
Carbs: 38 g,
Fat: 1 g,
Protein: 3 g.
How to Use:
Raw rice should typically be prepared with double the quantity of water.
One cup of rice should be added to at least two cups of boiling water.
Once it is cooked, it should be covered and left to stand before it is drained.
Serve this rice along with Dal or curry of your choice.
Benefits:
High fiber.
Aids digestive processes.
Boost energy and mood.
Low glycemic index, thereby lowering the impact of raised blood sugar.
Lowers cholesterol.

product_desc: Cold Pressed Natural Virgin Coconut Oil
about_the_product:
About the Product:
Coco Soul Cold Pressed Virgin Coconut Oil (VCNO) Superfood is 100% pure & natural. It is specifically prepared from fresh raw coconuts through a meticulous No Heat Process a cold extraction technology which helps preserve the vital nutrients, rich aroma and flavour of real coconuts, making it fit for raw consumption.VCNO Superfood is one of the richest plant-based sources of naturally occurring Medium Chain Triglycerides (MCTs). These MCTs contribute to 60% of the total fatty acid content and unlike long-chain saturated fats, get rapidly digested for instant energy release. Its high content of naturally occurring Lauric acid (C12) & Vitamin E allows for an incredible array of health-promoting properties. It can also help in weight management. The MCTs in VCNO break down into ketones that can support cognition/ memory function. Due to its better oxidative stability, VCNO is a great cooking medium even at high temperatures.
Ingredients:
Virgin Coconut Oil.
How to Use:
To liquefy, immerse in warm water.

about_the_product:
About the Product:
Everyday Basmati Rice is your ideal choice for daily culinary adventures. This premium basmati rice offers a delightful combination of flavour and aroma, enhancing your everyday meals. Carefully sourced and processed, each grain is known for its long, slender shape and non-sticky texture. Whether you're preparing biryani, pulao, or a simple side dish, this rice delivers the perfect balance of taste and quality. Elevate your daily cooking with the fragrant essence of Everyday Basmati Rice, making your meals a truly special experience.
How to Use:
Rinse the Rice: Before cooking, rinse the rice under cold running water to remove excess starch. This helps prevent clumping and ensures the grains remain separate.Cooking Methods: Everyday Basmati Rice can be prepared using various methods:Boiling: Use a 2:1 ratio of water to rice. Bring the water to a boil, add the rice, reduce the heat, cover, and simmer until the rice is tender and the water is absorbed.Steaming: You can use a rice cooker or a steaming basket for perfectly cooked rice.Pilaf and Biryani: Saute the rice with aromatics and spices before adding water for added flavour and texture.Fried Rice: Cook the rice with vegetables, protein, and your choice of seasonings for a tasty fried rice dish.Flavouring: Customize the flavour by adding various seasonings, herbs, or spices to the cooking water or while sautéing the rice.Serving: Everyday Basmati Rice pairs well with a variety of dishes, such as curries, stir-fries, grilled meats, and more. It can also be used in pilafs, biryanis, and as a side dish to complement your main course.Garnish: Enhance the presentation by garnishing your rice with fresh herbs, fried onions, or nuts.

About the Product:
We procure our red lobiya from small and marginal farmers working in the rainfed reg
ions of Karnataka who cultivate it without using any synthetic pesticides, herbicides, weedicides and GM seeds.
Red lobiya is an excellent source of plant-based protein. One cup (177 grams) of cooked red kidney beans contains about 15 grams of protein, making it a great protein source for vegetarians and vegans!
Red lobiya has been shown to have several health benefits, including improving blood sugar control, reducing the risk of heart disease, and aiding in weight management.
Like other legumes, Red lobiya is a nitrogen-fixing crop, which means it has the ability to convert atmospheric nitrogen into a form that can be used by plants. This improves soil health!
Like all our products, our Red Lobiya is tested free of pesticide residues!

Red Lobia

About the Product:
Lobia is a certain type of bean, which has a little oval structure with a black eye on it. It can be added to a number of cuisines starting from Dal to the salad. Red Lobia or China Bean is a relatively soft bean and there is no need to soak it as it cooks simply. These are rich in soluble fibre, fibre, protein, folate, complex carbohydrates, and iron. They are well non for their texture and their ability to absorb flavours. It contains high freshness, outstanding taste and high nutritional value.
Nutritional Facts:
Calories: 150,
Carbs: 0 g,
Fat: 0 g,
Protein: 0 g.
How to Use:
In traditional Southern cuisine, the cooked beans are mixed with meat, spices, and leafy greens.
It can be added to a variety of recipes, including soups, stews, and salads.
Benefits:
The potassium in lobia helps balance the excess sodium in our diets and keeps the blood pressure at a healthy level.
Lobia also contains vitamin B1, or thiamine, which helps maintain the health of nerves and is also essential for glucose metabolism in the body, and vitamin A, a vision-enhancing nutrient.
Lobia is loaded with fibre, and the kind it has is non as soluble fibre, which binds to cholesterol and helps throw it out of the body, besides keeping constipation away.

Store in a cool and dry place. Keep away from moisture.

When marinated or roasted, these seeds tend to become quite a delicious snack to hit up your snack cravings. They may be small in appearance but are packed full of nutrients. About the Product:
Black cardamom is a popular Indian spice, called badi elaichi or kali elaichi, that is used in many of the cuisine's signature dishes. It is in the form of seed pods, which are dark brown to black in colour and take on a smokey flavor due to the way they are dried. It has a smoky flavor which comes from the method of drying on a flame which also lends it a distinct aroma.
Nutritional Facts:
Calories: 18,
Total Fat: 0.4 g,
Carbohydrates: 4.0 g,
Fiber: 1.6 g,
Protein: 0.6 g.
How to Use:
Black cardamom pods can be used in soups, chowders, casseroles and marinades for a smoky flavor.
It also goes well in rice puddings, cakes, ginger fig chutney, payasam etc.
Black cardamom is also used in preparing garam masala, which is commonly used to flavour Indian curries, snacks and rice preparations too.
Benefits:
Antioxidant and Diuretic Properties may lower blood pressure.
May contain Cancer-Fighting Compounds.
May Protect from Chronic Diseases thanks to Anti-Inflammatory effects.
May help with Digestive Problems, including Ulcers.

About the Product:
Hing, also known as Asafoetida, is an Indian condiment that adds a unique flavour and aroma to almost any Indian cuisine. Catch Hing is a flavour-enhancer that is essential ingredient for kitchens. Asafoetida is sourced from prime spice growing areas and is a perfect substitute for Onion and Garlic. Hing also has medicinal properties to treat Stomach ailments.
How to Use:
Add a pinch of Catch Hing to your tadka. Other applications include using it as a direct spice in curries, vegetables, and gravies. You can also use Catch Hing for marinating white and red meat. |

About the Product:
Tajir Coconut Milk is Ideal for Making Curries, Coconut Rice Candies, Desserts, Puddings, Jam, Ice Cream, Cocotail Beverages and other Dishes or Preparations where the Delicate Flavour of Fresh Coconut Milk is Required.     As the Coconut Specialist, Kara takes pride in our product integrity by using carefully hand-picked fresh coconuts from our lush plantation in Indonesia.    Our involvement from seeding right down to processing allows us to monitor product integrity closely and efficiently. These stringent controls help to ensure that only the finest quality Kara products with the natural flavour of fresh coconuts are being produced.
Ingredients:
IngredientsFresh Coconut, Milk 99.70%, Carboxymethyl Cellulose (E466), Xanthan Gum (E415), Emulsifier (E435), Potassium Metabisulphite (E224).
How to Use:
Prune and Coconut Rice Pudding, Yield 8 Servings. Dissolve sugar in the coconut milk, add boiled rice and cook for 2-3 minutes, remove from fire, cool to room temperature.Add desiccated coconut powder, chopped prunes and fold in whipped cream, put in a decorative mould and set in the refrigerator for 2 hrs, de-mould and serve chilled.

How to Use:
It can be used for frying, roasting and baking.
The terms used in olive oil tasting are similar to those used in wine tasting. Good oil should be balanced, with the body and round flavours that develop in the mouth. General terms such as fruity, mature, pungent, bitter or sweet are used alongside other more specific associations such as grass, green leaves, almond or apple.
Pour approximately 1 tablespoon of Olive Oil in a small glass. Cover the glass with one hand and shake it delicately until the oil sticks on to the entire inside surface. Warm the oil in the glass with your hands till it is close to body temperature.
Lift the glass to your nose and sniff thrice, deeply (raising your nose up and away from the oil between each sniff).
Olive oils have aromas just like wine. Take a sip (approx. 10 drops into the mouth). Roll the olive oil around in your mouth for approximately 5 seconds.
The oil should touch all areas of the mouth so that the various tastes and sensations can be noted. Between tasting each kind of olive oil, drink lots of water and eat a small piece of bread to cleanse your palate.
Ingredients:
Extra Virgin Olive Oil.

About the Product:
Pure Ghee Sourced from the Land of the Tharparkar Cows: Our Desi Cow A2 Ghee is procured from the milk of the Tharparkar cows - which are a cow breed indigenous to the Thar Desert of India. These cows are grass-fed and are not factory-farmed, and are free from cross-breeding, which gives our Ghee its special natural qualities. An Ancient Secret Passed Down Through Generations: We employ a traditional 3000-year-old Vedic method originating in a Rajasthani village called Bilona (hand-churn) to craft our A2 ghee. The process involves boiling raw unprocessed cow milk and then converting it to curd in a clay pot. Furthermore, the curd is hand-churned (from the boiled milk) to help retain the nutrients. The final step is separating the butter to form the ghee. Revel in the Richness of A2 Ghee: The A2 milk used to make our ghee contains beta-casein protein that's supremely rich in nutrients such as calcium, iron, sodium, and fat-soluble vitamins A, D, and E, as well as Omega-3 and Omega-6 fatty acids. Ghee obtained from curd instead of the cream of cows contains good fats and can be easily digested by the body - this is because it aids the gastric juices in your system to break down foods you consume. Heals and Nourishes the Body: Regular consumption of our high-quality A2 ghee helps reduce cholesterol, improves the heart's functioning, and reduces joint pain. It is also known for its external healing properties. You can apply it to soothe skin burns or sunburns. In winter months, you can use it as a moisturiser to get rid of dry and flaky skin. Healthy Bodies Beating Hearts: Our ghee is Keto and Paleo diet friendly. It is suitable for adults as well as children. Use our natural A2 ghee to add flavour to your favourite meals. Since it has a high heating point, it retains all the essential nutrients while cooking. The ways to experiment with our A2 ghee are exciting and unlimited.
How to Use:
Add it on the food to make it more flavourful.

About the Product:
Zoff Cumin Whole is the best addition to your daily diet. Zoff Cumin Whole is a great addition to your food and beverages. Cumin contains compounds called flavonoids that work as antioxidants in the body. Antioxidants can help neutralize unstable particles called free radicals that cause cell damage. By neutralizing these particles, antioxidants can help prevent diseases like cancer, heart disease, and high blood pressure. Cumin seeds have been shown to have anti-inflammatory properties. Respiratory challenges are most often wrought with inflammation within the lung system—including the lungs, the trachea, and the bronchi. About the Product:
Selezione Casillo is a new reality, a young company with a great history behind it, born from the over 50 years of experience of the Casillo Group, today a leader in the processing and marketing of wheat. It was 1958, when Vincenzo Casillo started the milling activity in Corato; since then the Casillo Group has been able to grow and mature in the solidity of important values such as loyalty, transparency and respect. 
Soft Wheat Flour Type "00" also known as doppio zero flour or 00 flour, this versatile soft wheat flour is traditionally used in Italy for specially making Pizza and also used for home-made pasta, gnocchi, ciabatta bread and pastry. Since 24 Mantra Organic Besan is made by grinding organic, unpolished, unadulterated Chana Dal it possesses all the attributes of Chana Dal.
Our Besan is 100 % Organic, grown without synthetic pesticides and grown without synthetic GMOs.

product_desc: Ultra Low Carb Keto Flour - High Fibre, Dietitian Recommended Atta
about_the_product:
About the Product:
2.6 gms Net Carbs: The superfoods seeds formulation of our Keto Flour Low Carb Atta makes it ultra-low-carb, as well as high on fibre and nutrients. It is perfect for a Keto Diet along with the Paleo Diet, Atkins Diet, Diabetes Diet, and Vegan Diet.
Keeps You in Ketosis: The Lo! Keto flour for the Keto diet has been tested using Blood and Urine Ketone meters by practitioners to show that you remain in Ketosis; making it a great range of Keto Food Products.
Best Taste and Easy to Make: Our Keto Atta Flour is loved for its superior taste and texture with no aftertaste or smell. The Lo! Keto Atta does not need warm water or an extra 10-15 minutes of resting time. Make the dough and cook like you do with regular Atta to get soft and puffed-up Keto Rotis and Keto Breads. So easy, even your Cook can make it.
Used for Diabetic Care: The ultra-low carb Atta formulation ensures this is a Low GI Diabetic atta. So if you are on sugar-free biscuits, Diabetic Rice, or other Diabetic snacks, Rotis made from this sugar control atta can help ensure diabetic care.
Ingredients:
Seeds Mix (Sunflower, Flax, Melon, Pumpkin), Groundnuts, Isolated Wheat Protein, Defatted Soy Flour, Wheat Flour (Atta), Defatted Coconut Flour, Almond Flour, Xanthan Gum, Edible Common Salt.
Nutritional Facts:
Serving size: 20 g

Energy 84.7 kcal
Net carbohydrates 2.6 g
Total carbohydrates 6.1 g
Total fat 2.7 g
Sodium 75.7 mg
Added sugar 0 g
How to Use:
Add 1/2 cup ultra low-carb flour and 1/3 cup of water in a bowl. Knead till the dough is smooth.
No need to use warm water or give 10-15 minutes of resting time.
Make the dough and cook as you do with regular Atta, and you get great soft and puffed-up Rotis and fulkas.
So easy, that even your cook can make it. 
Storage: Store in a cool, dry place.
Other Product Info:

About the Product:
Our range of fresh and aromatic whole spices is carefully handpicked by our experts. They are cleaned, powdered and packed at our hygienic facilities. Coriander, Chilli, Fennel, Cassia, Salt, Bay leaves, Star Anise, Cumin, Pepper, Clove, Caraway, Cardamom & Ginger.
How to Use:
Garam Masala:

Heat 2 tbsp. of edible oil in a pan.
Add mustard, curry leaves, chopped onions, and chopped tomatoes, and sauté for 30 seconds.
Add cooked dal or steamed vegetables of your choice to the mixture.
Add 11⁄2 tbsp of bb ROYAL Garam Masala to this mixture and keep stirring on a low flame for 3 minutes.
Keep it covered for at least 5 minutes. Serve hot with rotis/chapatis.

About the Product:
Experience the simplicity and nourishment of 24 Mantra Organic Poha. Made from flattened rice flakes sourced from organic farms, this Poha is a versatile and quick-cooking ingredient. With its light and fluffy texture, it is perfect for making traditional Indian breakfast dishes like Poha Upma or Poha Cutlet. Packed with essential nutrients and dietary fibre, this organic Poha offers a wholesome and convenient option for a satisfying meal. Embrace the purity and authenticity of 24 Mantra Organic Poha in your kitchen.
Ingredients:
Organic Rice
Nutritional Facts:
Energy -- 355 kcal
Protein (g) --8
Fat (g) -- 1
of which saturates (g)--0
Carbohydrates(g)-- 81
of which sugars(g) --0.4
Sodium(mg)--1
Storage and Uses:
Soak the Poha in water for some time till they are soft and puffy.
Drain the water and keep aside.
Cut onions and potato and keep the, ready as the oil in the pan becomes hot.
Throw in some mustard seeds, green chillies, and curry leaves, then add the potatoes and onions along with some peanuts.
Once the potato has softened, add salt and turmeric along with the Poha.
Stir a little and you are done.
Store in a clean and dry place and in air tight container .

Tilda Nazarana Basmati Rice is versatile, fine, long-grained and perfectly textured natural rice. It is a variety of long, slender-grained aromatic rice. On cooking, the grains fluff up and do not stick together or break. This rice is known for its delectable taste, aroma and long slender length. It is an important part of all rice recipes. product_desc: Bilona Cow Ghee - 100% Pure & Natural Desi Ghee
product_USP: 100% Pure & Natural Desi Ghee, Traditional Curd-Churned
about_the_product:
About the Product:
Bilona Curd Churning Method: Auric Cow Ghee is made from curd, not milk cream. The freshly sourced Cow milk is boiled and set to curd, the curd is then hand-churned bi-directionally to obtain butter. The butter is separated and heated slowly to obtain our grainy textured and aromatic Ghee.
Lab Tested: Our Desi ghee from Land of Lord Krishna is Lab Tested & certified by FSSAI, US FDA & International food safety standards. It is pure, preservative free and chemical free.
100% Natural & Pure: There’s zero preservatives or additives in Auric Premium Cow Ghee. Our ghee retains all its natural goodness and is a great addition to any diet including paleo, keto, and Ayurvedic.
Speciality: Our Pure Desi Ghee is free from Preservatives, Vanaspati, Antibiotics, growth hormones and made from the milk of 100% stress-free cows that are grass-fed and not factory farmed. Hence it is cruelty free.
Eco-Friendly Packaging: To preserve quality and taste, we bring you Desi Ghee in high-quality glass jars that are a safer and non-toxic alternative to plastic.

Milk Fat (made from cow milk)

about_the_product:
About the Product:
Natureland Organics Whole Wheat Flour makes the best rotis for your dinner. Whole wheat flour is also rich in vitamins B-1, B-3, and B-5, along with riboflavin and folate. About the Product:
Want to make authentic Bengali Shorshe Posto at your home? Sunrise Shorshe Posto mix is here to save the day. Our Shorshe Posto mix gives you the delectable combination of strong, pungent mustard along with the creamy nuttiness of Poppy Seeds that’s unique to the Bengali palate.
This traditional blend of spices can be used to prepare a wide variety of vegetarian & non-vegetarian dishes, most suited for but not limited to fish curries. Gorge on some yummy ‘Bhetki Paturi’, or ‘Dharosh Shorshe Posto’ or bite into the deliciously juicy ‘Shorhse Posto Chicken’. Add some rice and you have the perfect Bengali meal. Savour many such delectable dishes that are deep with the flavour and texture of this lip-smacking ingredient.
Rich in copper, iron, manganese, and other nutrients, this ingredient takes care of not only taste but also your skin & heart health and helps you boost your immunity. Truly the best of both worlds! So why wait? Get your Sunrise Shorshe Posto mix and start cooking!
Ingredients:
Mixed Spices, Mustard & Poppy Seeds, Dehydrated Green Chillies And Iodised Salt.
Features:
SHORSHE POSTO – A traditional spice mix that is used to make authentic and popular Bengali dishes.
 INGREDIENTS - This pack contains a delectable blend of Shorshe (Mustard) & Posto (Poppy Seeds) that’s popularly used in Bengali cuisine to prepare many dishes.
FLAVOUR - Sunrise Shorshe Posto gives your dishes a strong, pungent taste of mustard complemented by the creamy and nutty texture of poppy seeds that is a hallmark of some Bengali dishes.
 CREATE TEMPTING DISHES - Sunrise Shorshe Posto spice mix can be used to prepare a variety of popular vegetarian & non-vegetarian Bengali dishes like Shorshe Posto Potol, Bhetki Bhape, Bhetki Paturi, Aloo Jhinge Shorshe Posto & more.
 LEGACY - Since its inception over a century ago, Sunrise has dedicated itself to delivering traditional, authentic taste & quality products that stay true to their origins.
OUR RANGE - Sunrise offers a range of products that cater to the Bengali palate such as Sunrise Pure Shukto Masala Powder, Sunrise Pure Macher Jhol Masala Powder, Sunrise Pure Panch Phoron Whole Spice etc.

About the Product:
Each cumin seed in this pack holds an ancient story. The one where medical practitioners in ancient India proclaimed it the best aid to digestion. The one where a spilt jar of the spice got kicked over and was buried for aeons, then excavated centuries later as part of a Syrian heritage site. The one where it occupied pride of place in its own container at a dinner table, right next to salt and pepper, in ancient Greece. The one where its significance was recorded in the Bible and the Old Testament. Which one is your favourite? Is it the one where the seed travelled to the Americas with Spanish sailors who had discovered that it helped preserve food on long voyages? The one where it slowly became the mainstay of Mexican and Latin American food over the years, joining ranks with Middle Eastern and Indian spice blends? Is it the one where it journeyed all the way to the Netherlands and became a mainstay of cheese from Leden? We’ll tell you what our favourite story is. It’s the one where our cumin makes its way from our family to yours, landing right in the midst of the magic happening in your kitchen, on your stovetop, in a burst of warmth and full-bodied flavour.
Ingredients:
Cumin Seed

product_desc: Keto Flour- No Soya, High Fibre & Protein, Lab Tested Low Carb Atta
about_the_product:
About the Product:
Keto Diet Made Healthier and Tastier: For the first time, absolutely soy-free Keto flour is available, making it a must-have staple for hardcore Keto diet followers, especially those who prefer soy-free options. This is the only soy-free flour for the Keto diet in the market, with just 1g net carbs per roti. It's not only extremely low in carbs but also a soy-free alternative for those avoiding soy in their diet.
Keeps You in Ketosis: The Lo! Low Carb Delight Keto flour has been tested using Blood Ketone Meter and Urine Keto strips, showing that it helps you remain in Ketosis.
Used by Professionals: The Keto Atta Flour is popular among homemakers and professional chefs due to its superior taste and texture. It has no aftertaste or smell. You can use it to make a variety of Keto food products like parathas, rotis, cookies, Keto pasta, Keto bread, and more. It offers an amazing texture and taste, better than Coconut Flour Keto and Almond Flour Keto.
Easy to Make: You don't need warm water or extended resting time. Making dough and cooking with this Keto flour is as simple as regular atta. You'll get great, soft, and puffed-up rotis and fulkas. It's so easy that even your cook can make it.
Used for Diabetic Care: The Keto Flour formulation ensures it's a Low GI Diabetic atta. If you are on sugar-free biscuits, diabetic rice, or other diabetic snacks, rotis made from this sugar control atta can help with your diabetic care.
Ingredients:
Groundnuts, Coconut Flour, Seed Mix (Flax, Pumpkin, Sunflower, Melon), Wheat Fibre, Isolated Wheat Protein, Almond Flour, Xanthan Gum, Salt.
Nutritional Facts:
Serving Size: 20 g

Calories: 88.7 Kcal
Net Carb: 0.9 g
Total Carb: 7.1 g
Dietary Fibre: 6.2 g
Total Fat: 3.9 g
Protein: 6.4 g

Complete protein, whole grain, gluten free.

ORGANIC INDIA Quinoa in India is Highly prized as a nutritious food by nutritionists and doctors. Cooked Quinoa (Kinwa) is a favorite because of its great taste, nutritional value, and ease of preparation. Quinoa can be used in place of rice in all your favorite meals.
ORGANIC INDIA's ethically produced and certified organic Quinoa is grown right here in India

About the Product:
Sattu flour is the superfood that is not only protein-rich, but diabetic-friendly, and hearth healthy flour. Sattu atta will help prepare a wholesome and nutritious meal that will excite your taste buds. The product is derived from sattu, a mixture of ground pulses and cereals. Sattu atta can be mixed with whole wheat flour to produce a variety of nutritious food items. Add it to you're regular roti dough or make paratha stuffing, littis or even make a protein shake with it.
Nutritional Facts:
Calories: 70,
Carbs: 6 g,
Fat: 4 g,
Protein: 3 g.
Benefits:
It is rich in protein.
Keeps you cool.
Great for digestion.
Regulates blood sugar.
How to Use:
One of the easiest uses of sattu is to make a sharbat (sweet or salty). According to doctors, this drink protects the body against sunstroke.
Made with sattu, onion, lemon juice, black salt, cumin powder, chaat masala and water this drink has a tangy and spicy taste.
For making the sweet version, take a glass of milk, add two tablespoon sattu powder, one teaspoon sugar or jaggery and mix well. Has it as a complete breakfast drink.
Sattu is also used in making ‘litti’. Apart from that, you can make parathas, upma, or even porridge with it.
It can also be mixed in milk, like protein powder and consumed.

About the Product:
Sattu flour is a superfood that is not only protein-rich, but diabetic-friendly, and hearth healthy flour. Sattu atta will help prepare a wholesome and nutritious meal that will excite your taste buds. The product is derived from sattu, a mixture of ground pulses and cereals. Sattu atta can be mixed with whole wheat flour to produce a variety of nutritious food items. Add it to you're regular roti dough or make paratha stuffing, littis or even make a protein shake with it.
Nutritional Facts:
Calories: 386,
Carbs: 61 g,
Fat: 6 g,
Protein: 22 g.
How to Use:
One of the easiest uses of sattu is to make a sharbat (sweet or salty). According to doctors, this drink protects the body against sunstroke.
Made with sattu, onion, lemon juice, black salt, cumin powder, chaat masala and water this drink has a tangy and spicy taste.
For making the sweet version, take a glass of milk, add two tablespoon sattu powder, one teaspoon sugar or jaggery and mix well. Has it as a complete breakfast drink.
Sattu is also used in making ‘litti’. Apart from that, you can make parathas, upma, or even porridge with it.
It can also be mixed in milk, like protein powder and consumed.
Benefits:
It is rich in protein.
Keeps you cool.
Great for digestion.
Regulates blood sugar.

About the Product:
Indrayani rice is a popular variety of aromatic short-grain rice grown in the Western state of Maharashtra, India. It is known for its delightful aroma and unique sweet taste. This rice is shorter, and plumper compared to other Indian rice varieties and becomes soft and slightly sticky upon cooking. Indrayani rice is highly versatile and is used in a variety of culinary applications. It is an integral part of the traditional Maharashtrian cuisine and is commonly used in dishes like khichdi, pulao, and sweet rice puddings. The rice is also used in the preparation of a popular dessert called 'narali bhaat' made during the coconut day festival. It's the soft texture and the ability to beautifully absorb flavors, make Indrayani rice a preferred choice for many households and restaurants.

about_the_product:
About the Product:
Aashirvaad, a brand that you love and trust, ensures that good quality products reach your kitchen hence it brings to you a range of organic products that are certified by the leading Organic product body.
Aashrvaad Organic Urad Dal adheres to stringent quality checks and organic product norms. It has been expertly sourced and hygienically packed to give you both, taste and nutrition. Also known as Split black gram, urad dal is one of the popular dals used widely in Indian cuisine. It can be used to make delicious breakfast dishes like idlis and dosas, tasty dals like dal makhani and kaali dal, and yummy snacks like medu vadas and dal kachoris. A versatile ingredient, urad dal is also nutritious; it is rich in protein*, dietary fibre**, and is a source of iron***.
So, people can now enjoy their favourite meals as Aashirvaad brings to you 100% organic products.
*As per the protein content of urad dal given in the Indian Food Composition Tables (IFCT) 2017, NIN.
**As per dietary fibre content of urad dal given in the Indian Food Composition Tables (IFCT) 2017, NIN.
***As per the iron content of urad dal given in the Indian Food Composition Tables (IFCT) 2017, NIN.

About the Product:
Everest presents their authentic range of masalas that are blended with a wide variety of handpicked and selected spices that bring a whole new flavour and meaning to your dishes. Rake up your favourite recipes and cuisines by adding this magical blend of Everest masalas.
Ingredients:
Coriander, Chilli, Cumin, Pigeon pea, Cassia leaf, Cassia, Clove, Garlic, Common salt, Black Pepper, Dry Ginger, Mustard, Black Cardamom, Turmeric, Star anise, Nutmeg and Asafoetida
How to Use:
With a sharp knife, make fine slits pn pieces of chicken legs and breast (1 Kg). Apply lime and salt. Keep for 15 min. Mix 2 tsp ginger-garlic paste, 4 tsp Everest Tandoori Chicken masala, 6 tbsp thick strained curd and salt. Marinate cut chicken in this mixture for at least 2 hrs. Apply 2 tsp melted butter on the chicken pieces and roast till well done.

About the Product:
This Everest blend strikes an even balance between aromatic and flavouring spice agents to give chicken a luscious, inviting flavour. Since this blend is used in apply-and-cook-over-the-fire situations, the flavouring spices predominate, in order not to dissipate under direct fire.

Anistar, Asafoetida, Black Cardamom, Black Pepper, Cassia, Cassia Leaf, Chilli, Clove, Common Salt, Coriander, Cumin, Dry Ginger, Garlic, Mustard, Nutmeg, Pigeon Pea (Toovar Dal), Poppy Seed, Turmeric.

In most non-veg., marinate-and-cook-over-the-fire preparations such as chicken, fish etc.
